thread.title: Silicon Valley Business App Awards - For the First Time in India
thread.title_full: Silicon Valley Business App Awards - For the First Time in India

title: Silicon Valley Business App Awards - For the First Time in India
text:
Thursday, September 24, 2015 3:12PM IST (9:42AM GMT) Silicon Valley Business App Awards - For the First Time in India Bangalore, Karnataka, India 
Regalix brings Silicon Valley Business App (SVBA) Awards, a leading App and Devices awards program to India, where the app and devices community has grown by leaps and bounds. The prestigious awards platform recognizes excellence in 3 main categories- mobile apps, social apps and wearable devices. The event will take place on 9th October 2015 in Bangalore, at Sterling Mac Hotel where the best developers from the apps and wearables communities will be felicitated for the pioneering work they are doing by pushing the frontiers of technology with their innovation. The annual award gets its name due to a close association with the Silicon Valley. However, given the growing contribution of Asian countries to the field of technology, it was only a matter of time before the awards expanded its footprints to Bangalore, ‘ The Silicon Valley of Asia ’. Nimish Vohra, Sr. Vice-President-Marketing, Regalix says, “We are glad to bring the SVBA Awards to Bangalore as a platform to showcase the best innovation from India and around the World.” More than a 100 Apps have been nominated for the Awards-DocuSign, Xerox Mobile for Docushare, RBL MoBank, Renault Karnavati and many more. The event will be host to participants showcasing innovative apps, with the jury comprising A L Jagannath from VMware, A S Rajgopal from NxtGen, Vamsi Krishna Vinjamuri from Altimetrik to name a few. Post a rigorous evaluation process, finalists will be presenting their innovations and the winners will be announced . With several industry leaders present at the event, SVBA Awards is a powerful platform for networking and making a brand’s presence felt at the right place. People wanting to attend the event can register themselves online http://www.svbaawards.com/register-now.html To get more details on SVBA Awards, please visit: http://www.svbaawards.com/ About Regalix Regalix is an award-winning Global Co-Innovation company that leverages technology and marketing to help companies grow. They create successful ventures with clients through co-innovation and idea-driven frameworks that inspire companies to think differently. Founded in 1998, Regalix is based in Palo Alto. For over a decade, we have provided complete marketing services – Social, Mobile, Content, Multi-channel Campaigns, Technology Development, and Analytics – to companies such as CA Technologies, Citi, Apple, eBay, Cisco, VMware, NetApp, Cypress, LSI, Keynote, and Wipro Technologies. For more information, please visit www.regalix.com
